verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe הַחֹֽקְקִ֖ים <S%H2710><s%> ha-cho-ke-Kim unto them that decree חִקְקֵי־ <S%H2711><s%> chik-kei- decrees אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; unrighteous וּֽמְכַתְּבִ֥ים <S%H3789><s%> u-me-chat-te-Vim and that write עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> 'a-Mal grievousness כִּתֵּֽבוּ׃ <S%H3789><s%> kit-Te-vu. [which] they have prescribed

לְהַטּ֤וֹת <S%H5186><s%> le-hat-Tot To turn aside מִדִּין֙ <S%H1779><s%> mid-Din from judgment דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> dal-Lim, the needy וְלִגְזֹ֕ל <S%H1497><s%> ve-lig-Zol and to take away מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat the right עֲנִיֵּ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-ni-Yei from the poor עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; of my people לִהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become אַלְמָנוֹת֙ <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-nOt that widows שְׁלָלָ֔ם <S%H7998><s%> she-la-Lam, may be their prey וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יְתוֹמִ֖ים <S%H3490><s%> ye-to-Mim the fatherless יָבֹֽזּוּ׃ <S%H962><s%> ya-Voz-zu. and [that] they may rob

וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- now what תַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su And what will ye do לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> le-Yom in the day פְּקֻדָּ֔ה <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-Dah, of visitation וּלְשׁוֹאָ֖ה <S%H7722><s%> u-le-sho-'Ah and in the desolation מִמֶּרְחָ֣ק <S%H4801><s%> mi-mer-Chak afar תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo; [which] shall come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> mi will you תָּנ֣וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> ta-Nu-su flee לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5833><s%> le-'ez-Rah, help-ed וְאָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> ve-'A-nah where תַעַזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> ta-'az-Vu leave כְּבוֹדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod-Chem. glorious

בִּלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti Without me they shall כָרַע֙ <S%H3766><s%> cha-Ra' bow down תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat among אַסִּ֔יר <S%H616><s%> 'as-Sir, under the prisoners וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat among הֲרוּגִ֖ים <S%H2026><s%> ha-ru-Gim under the slain יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu; and they shall fall בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> zoT likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> shav is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> ap-Po, For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ve-'od is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> ne-tu-Yah. [is] stretched out still ס sa-Mek

ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho O אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur Assyrian שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the rod אַפִּ֑י <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi; of mine anger וּמַטֶּה־ <S%H4294><s%> u-mat-teh- and the staff ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu whose בְיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Dam in their hand זַעְמִֽי׃ <S%H2195><s%> za'-Mi. is mine indignation

בְּג֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> be-Goy nation חָנֵף֙ <S%H2611><s%> cha-Nef him against an hypocritical אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> 'a-shal-le-Chen-nu, I will send וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- against עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am and against the people עֶבְרָתִ֖י <S%H5678><s%> 'ev-ra-Ti of my wrath אֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H6680><s%> 'a-tzav-Ven-nu; will I give him a charge לִשְׁלֹ֤ל <S%H7997><s%> lish-Lol to take שָׁלָל֙ <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal the spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> ve-la-Voz and to take בַּ֔ז <S%H957><s%> Baz, the prey; וּלְשִׂימֹו u-le-si-mov כוּלְשׂוּמֹ֥ו <S%H7760><s%> u-le-su-Mo appoint קמִרְמָ֖ס <S%H4823><s%> mir-Mas trample כְּחֹ֥מֶר <S%H2563><s%> ke-Cho-mer like the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> chu-Tzot. of the streets

וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> chen so יְדַמֶּ֔ה <S%H1819><s%> ye-dam-Meh, Howbeit he meaneth וּלְבָב֖וֹ <S%H3824><s%> u-le-va-Vo not so neither doth his heart לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> chen so יַחְשֹׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> yach-Sho; think כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki rather לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> le-hash-Mid to destroy בִּלְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vo, so but [it is] in his heart וּלְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> u-le-hach-Rit and cut off גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor מְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> me-'At. not a few

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יֹאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar; For he saith הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo are not שָׂרַ֛י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rai [Are] not my princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav altogether מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim. king

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo like כְּכַרְכְּמִ֖ישׁ <S%H3751><s%> ke-char-ke-Mish Carchemish כַּלְנ֑וֹ <S%H3641><s%> kal-No; [Is] not Calno אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo like כְאַרְפַּד֙ <S%H774><s%> che-'ar-Pad Arpad חֲמָ֔ת <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat, Hamath אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not כְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> che-dam-Me-sek Damascus שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron. Samaria

כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after מָצְאָ֣ה <S%H4672><s%> ma-tze-'Ah hath found יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, As my hand לְמַמְלְכֹ֖ת <S%H4467><s%> le-mam-le-Chot the kingdoms הָאֱלִ֑יל <S%H457><s%> ha-'e-Lil; of the idols וּפְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6456><s%> u-fe-Si-lei-Hem, and whose graven images מִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> mi-ru-sha-Lim did excel them of Jerusalem וּמִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> u-mish-sho-me-Ron. and of Samaria

הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo, not כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher not עָשִׂ֛יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti Shall I not as I have done לְשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> le-sho-me-Ron unto Samaria וְלֶאֱלִילֶ֑יהָ <S%H457><s%> ve-le-'e-li-Lei-ha; and her idols כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh so do לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> li-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem וְלַעֲצַבֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6091><s%> ve-la-'a-tzab-Bei-ha. images ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, will be that כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when יְבַצַּ֤ע <S%H1214><s%> ye-vatz-Tza' hath performed אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Wherefore it shall come to pass [that] when the Lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַֽעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Se-hu, his whole work בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har upon mount צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon Zion וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim; and on Jerusalem אֶפְקֹ֗ד <S%H6485><s%> 'ef-Kod, I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> pe-ri- the fruit גֹ֙דֶל֙ <S%H1433><s%> go-del of the stout לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav heart מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- of the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> tif-'E-ret and the glory ר֥וּם <S%H7312><s%> rum of his high עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav. looks

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, For he saith בְּכֹ֤חַ <S%H3581><s%> be-Cho-ach By the strength יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di of my hand עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti, I have done וּבְחָכְמָתִ֖י <S%H2451><s%> u-ve-cha-che-ma-Ti [it] and by my wisdom כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נְבֻנ֑וֹתִי <S%H995><s%> ne-vu-No-ti; for I am prudent וְאָסִ֣יר׀ <S%H5493><s%> ve-'a-Sir and I have removed גְּבוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1367><s%> ge-vu-Lot the bounds עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim, of the people; וַעֲתִידֹתֵיהֶם va-'a-ti-do-tei-hem כוַעֲתוּדֹֽותֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6264><s%> va-'a-tu-do-tei-Hem treasures קשׁוֹשֵׂ֔תִי <S%H8154><s%> sho-Se-ti, and have robbed וְאוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> ve-'o-Rid and I have put down כַּאבִּ֖יר <S%H47><s%> ka-Bir man יוֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim. the inhabitants

וַתִּמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> vat-tim-Tza hath found כַקֵּ֤ן׀ <S%H7064><s%> chak-Ken as a nest יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di And my hand לְחֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> le-Cheil the riches הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, of the people וְכֶאֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> ve-che-'e-Sof and as one gathereth בֵּיצִ֣ים <S%H1000><s%> bei-Tzim eggs עֲזֻב֔וֹת <S%H5800><s%> a-zu-Vot, [that are] left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz all the earth אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אָסָ֑פְתִּי <S%H622><s%> 'a-Sa-fe-ti; have I gathered וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become נֹדֵ֣ד <S%H5074><s%> no-Ded and there was none that moved כָּנָ֔ף <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf, the wing וּפֹצֶ֥ה <S%H6475><s%> u-fo-Tzeh or opened פֶ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> feh the mouth וּמְצַפְצֵֽף׃ <S%H6850><s%> u-me-tzaf-Tzef. or peeped

הֲיִתְפָּאֵר֙ <S%H6286><s%> ha-yit-pa-'Er boast הַגַּרְזֶ֔ן <S%H1631><s%> hag-gar-Zen, Shall the axe עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over הַחֹצֵ֣ב <S%H2672><s%> ha-cho-Tzev itself against him that heweth בּ֑וֹ bo; אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יִתְגַּדֵּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> yit-gad-Del magnify הַמַּשּׂוֹר֙ <S%H4883><s%> ham-mas-sOr therewith;[or] shall the saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over מְנִיפ֔וֹ <S%H5130><s%> me-ni-Fo, itself against him that shaketh כְּהָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> ke-ha-Nif should shake שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <S%H7626><s%> she-vet it;as if the rod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מְרִימָ֔יו <S%H7311><s%> me-ri-Mav, [itself] against them that lift it up כְּהָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> ke-ha-Rim should lift up מַטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh [or] as if the staff לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not עֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz. [itself as if it were] no wood

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> La-chen Therefore יְשַׁלַּ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> ye-shal-Lach send הָאָד֜וֹן <S%H113><s%> ha-'a-Don Therefore shall the Lord יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts בְּמִשְׁמַנָּ֖יו <S%H4924><s%> be-mish-man-Nav among his fat ones רָז֑וֹן <S%H7332><s%> ra-Zon; leanness וְתַ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat and under כְּבֹד֛וֹ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Do and under his glory יֵקַ֥ד <S%H3344><s%> ye-Kad he shall kindle יְקֹ֖ד <S%H3350><s%> ye-Kod a burning כִּיק֥וֹד <S%H3350><s%> ki-Kod A burning אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh. like the burning of a fire

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will become אֽוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> 'or- And the light יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> le-'Esh, shall be for a fire וּקְדוֹשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6918><s%> u-ke-do-Sho and his Holy One לְלֶהָבָ֑ה <S%H3852><s%> le-le-ha-Vah; for a flame וּבָעֲרָ֗ה <S%H1197><s%> u-va-'a-Rah, and it shall burn וְאָֽכְלָ֛ה <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-che-Lah and devour שִׁית֥וֹ <S%H7898><s%> shi-To his thorns וּשְׁמִיר֖וֹ <S%H8068><s%> u-she-mi-Ro and his briers בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. in one

וּכְב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> u-che-Vod the glory יַעְרוֹ֙ <S%H3293><s%> ya'-Ro of his forest וְכַרְמִלּ֔וֹ <S%H3759><s%> ve-char-mil-Lo, and of his fruitful field מִנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> min-Ne-fesh both soul וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar and body יְכַלֶּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> ye-chal-Leh; And shall consume וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּמְסֹ֥ס <S%H4549><s%> kim-Sos fainteth נֹסֵֽס׃ <S%H5264><s%> no-Ses. lift up as an ensign
